600 Hochstetter’s frogs rehomed during Brynderwyn roadworks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/600-hochstetters-frogs-rehomed-during-brynderwyns-roadworks-project/TYKCYXTY25HJJKTQ6H2VQAQPKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/600-hochstetters-frogs-rehomed-during-brynderwyns-roadworks-project/TYKCYXTY25HJJKTQ6H2VQAQPKU/ Sarah CurtisThere are strict protocols for construction in the environmentally sensitive Brynderwyns. Tue, 09 Apr 2024 18:00:00 +0000 During recent roading work, the Brynderwyns were discovered to be an important habitat for New Zealand's highly endangered Hochstetter's frog. Photo / Aaron Thompson, Auckland Council.

Man almost loses leg to sepsis after cut to back of head with barber’s clippers https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-almost-loses-leg-to-sepsis-after-cut-to-back-of-head-with-barbers-clippers/M3CXMFPWDBDCDIYIIOXC2TV3U4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-almost-loses-leg-to-sepsis-after-cut-to-back-of-head-with-barbers-clippers/M3CXMFPWDBDCDIYIIOXC2TV3U4/ Kirsty WynnA small cut at the barber turned nasty for a Rotorua man.
